data.name: Breach - Hero DLC
data.detailed_description:
In Breach, we’re looking for a few good Heroes, and you certainly seem the part. We want all of you new Mages to join the Academy and endlessly customize your favorite class. Arcane Wizards, Techno-Magical Gunslingers, Dark Assassins, Necromancers and more make up a diverse cast with unique abilities. Bend time, raise the dead, and launch into the fray with an arsenal of weapons and magic. Improve and customize your character to complement your teammates or counter whatever your enemy throws at you.

The Breach Hero Pack will start you off right with 12 individual Heroes in Steam Early Access, so you can spend your time learning just how the various Schools of Magic can transform your abilities and playstyles.

  • Aurous Gladiator Hero Class
  • Bloodstalker Hero Class
  • Chronomancer Hero Class
  • Elementalist Hero Class
  • Engineer Hero Class
  • Exorcist Hero Class
  • Lich Hero Class
  • Nighthawk Hero Class
  • Occultist Hero Class
  • Reaper Hero Class
  • Sniper Hero Class
  • Vanguard Hero Class

Oh but that’s not all. A Hero in Breach also needs to be able to savor when victory approaches, so we’re outfitting you with a handful of bonus items to really celebrate and show off just how badly you’ve defeated those evil Veil Demons threatening the rest of society.

  • Shuffle Dance Emote
  • Do It! Emote
  • Denied Spray
  • Exclusive Hero Wallpaper
  • Hero Digital Artbook

Welcome to the Dungeon Brawl.

data.short_description: The Breach Hero Pack will start you off right with 12 individual Heroes in Steam Early Access.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Dual Core Intel Nehalem Processor (ex, Core i3/i5/i7)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 or ATI Radeon 6850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Dual Core Intel Nehalem Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1.5 GB Nvidia GTX 660 or ATI Radeon 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
